iiv.io

Class CNUImgFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • iiv.data.CNUData
      • iiv.io.CNUImgFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CNUConversionTypes, CNUFileObject, iiVScriptable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CMRRSdtImgFile, CNUAnalyzeImgFile, CNUEcat7ImgFile, CNUEcatImgFile, CNUNiftiImgFile, CNURawImgFile, DICOMImgFile, ThreeDSSPFile

    public class CNUImgFile
extends CNUData
implements CNUFileObject, CNUConversionTypes, iiVScriptable
    Treats a file as raw image data.
    See Also:
    CNURawImgFile, CNUAnalyzeImgFile, CNUEcatImgFile, CNUStdImgFile
